metadata.title: Arts Martiaux Reims | Kung Fu, Krav Maga, Taichi & More
metadata.description: Discover martial arts in Reims: Kung Fu, Krav Maga, Jeet Kune Do, Taichi, Taekwondo and MMA. Classes for all ages and levels.

hero.subtitle: Martial Arts in Reims
hero.title: The Art of Combat
hero.description: Discover the way of martial arts with authentic teaching. From traditional Kung Fu to modern Krav Maga, find your discipline.

disciplines.title: Our Disciplines
disciplines.subtitle: Excellence in diversity
disciplines.description: Complete martial arts teaching adapted to all ages and levels.

kungfu.name: Kung Fu
kungfu.description: A millennial Chinese martial art, Kung Fu develops strength, flexibility and mental discipline through striking, blocking techniques and traditional forms.

kravmaga.name: Krav Maga
kravmaga.description: Israeli self-defense system renowned for its effectiveness in real situations. Learn to defend yourself with simple and direct techniques.

jeetkundo.name: Jeet Kune Do
jeetkundo.description: Created by Bruce Lee, Jeet Kune Do is a combat philosophy that uses the best of each martial art for maximum effectiveness.

taichi.name: Taichi Qigong
taichi.description: Internal martial art that harmonizes body and mind. Taichi improves balance, reduces stress and develops vital energy.

taekwondo.name: Taekwondo
taekwondo.description: Korean martial art characterized by its spectacular leg techniques. Develop power, agility and body control.

mma.name: MMA
mma.description: Mixed Martial Arts combine the best techniques from multiple disciplines for complete standing and ground combat.

children.name: Children Classes
children.description: Martial arts introduction adapted for children. Develop their motor skills, confidence and discipline in a fun and safe environment.

about.title: The Master
about.subtitle: Excellence & Transmission
about.name: Grégory Bezruki
about.bio: With 45 years of martial arts practice, Grégory Bezruki spent 6 years at the Shaolin Se WushuGuan Temple in China (1998-2005), designated as disciple and representative for Northern France. Holder of the State Sports Educator Diploma (2003), he has been teaching in Reims since 2013.
about.philosophy: "Able to explain methods in depth to practitioners to help them better understand, I can support and consolidate your progression and wellness objectives."

schedule.title: Class Schedule
schedule.subtitle: Find the slot that suits you

footer.tagline: The art of combat, the way of excellence
footer.copyright: © 2024 Arts Martiaux Reims. All rights reserved.
